name: Red Square (itch) (Nerdy_Games)
description:
This is my first ever game, I made this using Clickteam Fusion, it's just a demo, it's still in active development, I just started using Clickteam like 2 months ago, so yeah, enjoy!

Controls: Arrow Keys to move,

Goal: Get to the green area to finish the game.

(Early Access)

(More Levels Coming Soon)
